summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6655 for the improvement of S. Monroe St. from 32nd Ave. S. to approximately 60 feet east of 34th Ave. S; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by the construction of sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; and otherwise improving the same; providing for the accquisition of the right of way necessary therefor; under Ordinance No. 104492, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
